definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Maybe a set of matching whiskers.
sentences.chinese: 也许是一副配套的脑波控制胡须吧。

sentences.english: Patients in treatment group were treated by risperdal and brainwave treatment, and those in control group were treated only by risperdal for 8 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 观察组配合脑波治疗，根据患者症状选择操作程序。

sentences.english: Early infantile epileptic encephalopathy was diagnosed based on the clinical and EEG features.
sentences.chinese: 根据临床及脑波，他被诊断为婴儿早期癫痫脑病变。

sentences.english: I've been reading her psychology by looking at her brain waves and so forth and so on.
sentences.chinese: 我一直通过脑波来研究她的心理状况。

sentences.english: Interictal electroencephalography (EEG) showed a burst-suppression pattern.
sentences.chinese: 发作间脑波显现阵发压抑形态。

sentences.english: Either way, the “Brainwave Sofa” is clearly a one-of-a-kind piece of furniture.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，脑波沙发都是一件独一无二的家具。

sentences.english: These 'earth brainwaves´ are identical to the spectrum of our brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 这些“地球脑波”与我们人类脑波的波谱相同。

sentences.english: These 'earth brainwaves´ are identical to the spectrum of our brainwaves.
sentences.chinese: 这些“地球脑波”与我们人类脑波的波谱相同。
